body.p: To his excelency the governor of of Ky B Magoffin

Your petitioner Lewis Young says at the last term of the Anderson Circuit court Judgement was rendered against him upon a forfeited reconizance in which the said Louis Young was Surity for A D, Young in the sum of one hundred and fifty dollars to keep the peace. It was forfeited by said A D, Young by his geting into a spree and commiting a breach of the peace which amountinged to a breach of the forfeiture of the bond,

Your petitioner is the father of A D, Young and A D Young is an inoffensive man when sober, and this petitioner is a kind and affectionate father and led by parental feelings was induced to enter upon the bond of his son.

He therefore prays, together with the undersigned citizens of Anderson County, that said forfeiture be remited.
Nov 4th 1861.

Jef Searcy
